intent: Audit npm dependencies for security issues, outdatedness, and maintenance status

success_criteria.primary: Identifies actionable issues with the specified dependencies

must_identify.lodash_4.17.20: Known prototype pollution vulnerabilities in versions < 4.17.21
must_identify.express_4.17.1: Outdated but functional; security patches in newer versions
must_identify.moment_2.29.1: In maintenance mode; recommend alternatives (date-fns, dayjs, Luxon)

must_provide: Current version vs latest version comparison
Severity assessment for any known vulnerabilities

quality_rubric.specificity: Names specific CVEs or vulnerability types
quality_rubric.actionability: Clear steps to remediate (npm update X, or replace Y with Z)
quality_rubric.prioritization: Security issues ranked above mere outdatedness
